data.text: @charts_zone If u are doing momentum investing with diversification dips will be part of any strong chart. Till the chart structure is not distorted shouldn't you hold .
@FcKeval the end goal is to beat the benchmark through any route.

@charts_zone So sir from this we can say that absolute return can be more or less than relative return if our absolute return is more than relative return we are outperforming the index which we have set.
